description: F10 – Enable the “LIM” function with Cruise Control button
steps:
1. ICM_QL -> 3000 -> LDM_SLD_Funktion -> aus set to ein (As presently configured, you have three redundant ways to set the CC speed (the SET button, the RES button and the rocker switch). With the change in coding,
now you will have a new function activated by the SET button (the LIM function) and the rocker switch/RES will be your way of setting the CC speed)
2. ICM_QL -> 3000 -> LDM_Umschaltung_ACC_DCC -> unterdruecken set to zulassen (F10 =ICM-> 3000 Daten,F8-> C_Umschaltung_ACC_DCC)
3. KOMBI -> 3003 -> SLD_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv (F10 = ICM-> 3000 Daten,F8-> C_SLD_FUNKTION?)
4. ICM_QL -> 3000 -> LDM_SET_Taste -> SET_und_aktivieren__IO set to nur_SET__O (LIM/SET button only works with LIM (use rocker for set Cruise Control), Not in F10 2011?)

description: F10/F11 – Enable Night Vision with Background Pedestrian Detection
steps:
1. KOMBI -> 3003 -> FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv (One problem (in the F10) with the system is that the camera has to be turned on and actively showing the image before pedestrian warnings can be issued. Very few
of us run around with the infrared camera urned on occupying most of the central information display. With the changes below, your system will essentially be on at
all times (at night of course), monitoring for pedestrians in the background and providing you warnings via the cluster and/or the HUD)
2. NIVI2 -> 3253 -> PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND -> OFF set to ON
3. NIVI2 -> 3000 -> CC_Messages -> ACTIVE_NV2 set to ACTIVE_NV2P_BD (Not useful without PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND & FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE)
4. NIVI2 -> 3000 -> Light_Sensor -> ON_WITH_RLS_INFO set to ON_WITH_PWR_ON (Not useful without PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND & FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE)
5. NIVI2 -> 3250 -> USE_ACUTE_WARNING -> AW_OFF set to AW_ON (Not useful without PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND & FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE)
6. NIVI2 -> 3250 -> USE_ACUTE_SOUND -> AW_OFF set to AW_ON (Not useful without PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND & FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE)
7. NIVI2 -> 3252 -> R1_ACTIVE -> AW_OFF set to AW_ON (Not useful without PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND & FGS_NIVI_KI_ENABLE)
8. NIVI2 -> 3253 -> PED_DET_IN_BACKGROUND -> OFF set to ON (This is key for Night Vision in the background)
9. NIVI2 -> 3253 -> BD_MINIMUM_SPEED -> Werte=08 set to Werte=00 (This will allow detection of pedestrians at any speed. Normally this is only active at speeds of 8 mph or higher)
10. NIVI2 -> 3240 -> DTC_ENABLE_13 -> CL15on-DTCon - BD disabled set to CL15on-DTCon - BD enabled (No BD-Enabled or BD Disabled? What would be the Werte value?)

description: F10/F11 – Lane Departure

1. KAFAS -> 3000 TLC_CODING -> ANZEIGEVARIANTE -> anz_var_04 set to anz_var_02 (Lane departure warning system, The display in the instrument cluster (and HUD): No lines shown by default. They only show up (along with the two triangles) when at
least one lane marking (or a curb) are detected)

2. KAFAS -> 3000 TLC_CODING -> ROAD_EDGE_WARNING_ENABLED -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=grass_curb (As presently set, it detects only road markings (i.e. painted lane markings). With the following code change, it can also detect grass and road sides)

5. Position Lights (Angel Eyes and Front Side LED's) - FRM -> 3050 -> WL_FUNKTION_POL -> hard_on / Werte=02 set to nicht_aktiv / soft_on / hard_on / soft_on_LED (0 = Off; 1 = Soft (log); 2 = Hard (instant on); 3 = Soft (exp))
6. Tail Lights - FRM -> 3050 -> WL_FUNKTION_SSL -> hard_on / Werte=02 set to nicht_aktiv / soft_on / hard_on / soft_on_LED (0 = Off; 1 = Soft (log); 2 = Hard (instant on); 3 = Soft (exp))

steps: 2. Daytime Running Light (DRL) Brightness in % - FRM -> 3050 -> HELLIGKEIT_DRL -> wert_01 100% / Werte=64 set to wert_01 100% / wert_02 50% / wert_03 54% / wert_04 80% / wert_05 51% (NOT TESTED)

1. FRM -> 3030 -> FH_TUER_AUF_STOP_MAUT -> Werte=3B set to aktiv / Werte=01 (Opening doors (FRONT) will not interrupt window roll up operation. Normally, if you open a door while the window is automatically rolling up, it will stop the
operation. This feature disables it. May need to wait for iDrive to reset for activation)

2. JBBF -> 3070 -> FH_TUER_AUF_STOP_MAUT -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv (Opening doors (REAR) will not interrupt window roll up operation. Normally, if you open a door while the window is automatically rolling up, it will stop the operation.
This feature disables it. May need to wait for iDrive to reset for activation)

2. FRM -> 3020 -> ASP_BEIKLAPPEN_BEI_KOMFORTSCHLIESSEN -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01 (REQUIRED)

description: F10/F11 – Key Access
steps: 1. Remote Key opens with a 4th button tailgate or rear window (active) - CAS -> 3002 CLM -> OPEN_RSCR_WITH_REMOTE_KEY_SPFN -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01
2. Remote Key opens with 3rd button tailgate or rear window (active) - CAS -> 3002 CLM -> OPEN_RSCR_WITH_REMOTE_KEY_SPFN -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01

3. Remote Key with 4th button (Special Function) activation - Enables Follow-Me-Home Lighting (Pathway Lighting) with short=press of Fob Button 4 (Panic Button) - CAS -> 3002 CLM -> REMOTE_KEY_SPECIAL_FCT -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01
4. Can be the key 4 the FBD (OP_KEY_BUT_SPFN) used for the opening of the HK - CAS -> 3010 HKL_BEDIENUNG -> USE_FBD4 -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01

description: F10/F11 – Unlock doors when engine is stopped
steps: 1. CAS -> 3002 CLM -> ER_KEYOUT_AUTOVR -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F10/F11 – Turn off radio and navi when opening door
steps: 1. CAS -> 3000 TC -> TC_LOGIC_KLR_OFF_DOOR -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F10/F11 – Auto start stop default; last setting on or off
steps: 1. Turn Auto Start/Stop OFF by default - CAS -> 3000 TC -> TC_MSA_DEFAULT_OFF -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01
2. Sets car's Auto Start/Stop function to start in the last used setting (e.g. Off) when the engine is started - CAS -> 3000 TC -> TC_MSA_MEMORY -> nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 set to aktiv / Werte=01

description: F10/F11 – Seatbelt Reminders & Warnings
steps: 1. Duration of the SBR (Seatbelt Reminder) warnings - ASCM -> 3001 -> GWF_SBR_WARNDAUER -> wert_01 / Werte=5A set to Werte = 01 (for 1 second)  ((typically 90s) - 5A HEX = 90 Decimal)
2. Disable seat belt status display - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> Gurtzustandsanzeige_Beifahrer_GWF_GZA_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
3. Disable seat belt status display - driver - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> Gurtzustandsanzeige_Fahrer_GWF_GZA_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
4. Disable seat belt reminder - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> SBR_BF_GWF_SBR_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 (Depend on Build Date)
5. Disable seat belt reminder - driver - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> SBR_FA_GWF_SBR_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 (Depend on Build Date)
6. Disable sound on disconnect SB - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> SPW_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 (Depend on Build Date)
7. Disable sound on disconnect SB - driver - ASCM -> 3000 Ausstattungsflags -> SPW_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00 (Depend on Build Date)
8. Disable seat belt reminder - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_PreWarning_Beifahrer -> - set to nicht_aktiv (Depend on Build Date)
9. Disable seat belt reminder - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_PreWarning_Fahrer -> - set to nicht_aktiv (Depend on Build Date)
10. Disable sound on disconnect SB - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> SeatBeltReminder_SBR_Beifahrer -> - set to nicht_aktiv (Depend on Build Date)
11. Disable sound on disconnect SB - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> SeatBeltReminder_SBR_Fahrer -> - set to nicht_aktiv (Depend on Build Date)

description: F30/F32 – Headlamp Washers Configuration
steps: 1. Completely disables the Headlamp Washers - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_SCHEINWERFERREINIGUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
2. Windshield wipe cycles after washing - FEM_BODY -> 3081 -> WW_ANZAHL_NACHWISCHZ_FRONT -> 3_mal_Nachwischen set to
3. Number of headlamp spray pulses - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_ANZAHL_SPRITZIMPULSE_SRA -> 2_Impulse set to 3_Impulse
4. Number of washes before headlamp wash reactivation - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_ANZAHL_WASCHBET_ZUR_SRA -> 10_Betaetigungen set to User Value
5. Changes how long it washes per pulse (Value in 100ms) - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_DAUER_SPRITZIMPULSE_SRA -> werte=0A (1000ms) set to User Value
6. Max Speed to activate Headlamp Washers - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_SRA_GESCHWINDIGKEITS_DEAKTIVIERUNG -> werte=82 (130km/h) set to User Value
7. Change the pause is between wash pulses (Value in 100ms) - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_PAUSE_SPRITZIMPULSE_SRA -> werte=0A (1000ms) set to User Value
8. Change the wait time is before reactivation (Value in 1min) - FEM_BODY -> 3080 -> WW_SRA_SPERRZEIT -> werte=0A (10min) set to User Value

description: F30/F32 – Seat Heating Temperature Levels/Memory Seats
steps: 1. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Upper Body - Setting 1 Value (Default: 95° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_1_FRONT -> werte = 96 set to User Value
2. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Upper Body - Setting 2 Value (Default: 106° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_2_FRONT -> werte = A2 set to User Value
3. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Upper Body - Setting 3 Value (Default: 116° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_3_FRONT -> werte = AE set to User Value
4. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Lower Body - Setting 1 Value (Default: 94° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_1_FRONT -> werte = 94 set to User Value
5. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Lower Body - Setting 2 Value (Default: 104° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_2_FRONT -> werte = A0 set to User Value
6. Heated Seat Temperature - Front Seats - Lower Body - Setting 3 Value (Default: 114° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_3_FRONT -> werte = AC set to User Value
7. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Upper Body - Setting 1 Value (Default: 95° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_1_FOND -> werte = 96 set to User Value
8. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Upper Body - Setting 2 Value (Default: 106° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_2_FOND -> werte = A2 set to User Value
9. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Upper Body - Setting 3 Value (Default: 116° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_LEHNE_STUFE_3_FOND -> werte = AE set to User Value
10. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Lower Body - Setting 1 Value (Default: 94° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_1_FOND -> werte = 94 set to User Value
11. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Lower Body - Setting 2 Value (Default: 104° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_2_FOND -> werte = A0 set to User Value
12. Heated Seat Temperature - Rear Seats - Lower Body - Setting 3 Value (Default: 114° F) - FEM_BODY -> 3090 -> TEMP_SITZ_STUFE_3_FOND -> werte = AC set to User Value
13. Activates ‘Easy Entry’ (Will stop moving forward if gear is engaged) - SM2 -> 3000 -> EINAUSSTIEGSHILFE -> nicht_aktiv set to Modus_FA_SLV
14. Vehicle will gong when Seat Memory has been successfully stored - SM2 -> 3000 -> MEMORY_GONG -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F34 – Active Spoiler (F34 3-Series GT only)
steps: 1. The speed of when the Active Spoiler is active. (Default: 110 km/h) - HKFM -> ????? -> V_ASP_OUT -> 00, 6E set to 00, (User Value)
2. The inverted speed of when the Active Spoiler is active - HKFM -> ????? -> INV_V_ASP_OUT -> FF, 91 set to FF, (User Value)

description: F30/F32 – BMW Live Enabling
steps: 1. Enable BMW Live - Part 1 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> CONNECTED_DRIVE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. Enable BMW Live - Part 2 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ONLINE_BROWSER_LIVE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
3. Enable BMW Live - Part 3 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> ONLINE_BROWSER -> - set to nur_bmw_internet_aktiv
4. Enable BMW Live - Part 4 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> ONLINE_SERVICES -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
5. Enable BMW Live - Part 5 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> ONLINE_SERVICES_GLS -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
6. Enable BMW Live - Part 6 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> DUN_PROFILE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
7. Enable BMW Live - Part 7 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> PAN_PROFILE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
8. Enable BMW Live - Part 8 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> BT_DATA_SERVICE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Heads-Up Display
steps: 1. Displays the HWY Junction Images on HUD **Works if updated. Minor visual errors.** - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> JUNCTION_VIEW_HUD -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. Adds checkbox Heads Up Display Settings for "Entertainment/Telephone" - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> HUD_ENTERTAINMENTLIST -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
3. Shows Active Cruise Control iBrake Distance in HUD (Part 1) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> HUD_DISTANCE_INFO -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
4. Shows Active Cruise Control iBrake Distance in HUD (Part 2) - KOMBI -> 3008 -> HUD_PIA_IBRAKE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
5. Shows Active Cruise Control iBrake Distance in HUD (Part 3) - KOMBI -> 3000 -> IBRAKE_ABSTAND_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
6. Enable Entertainment Menu in HUD - KOMBI -> 3000 -> HUD_ENTERTAINMENT_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
7. Enables Telephone Recent Call List in HUD - KOMBI -> 3000 -> HUD_TELEFONANRUF_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
8. Displays Voice Command in HUD - KOMBI -> 3000 -> HUD_SPRACHEINGABE_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
9. Change HUD Startup Screen Time to be fast or slower. (Value in seconds) - KOMBI -> 3000 -> HUD_START_UP_SCREEN_ANZ_ZEIT -> 3 set to User Value

description: F30/F32 – Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information Activation
steps: 1. Real-Time Traffic Info - Part 1 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> NAVI_TRAFFIC_INFO_MAP -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. Real-Time Traffic Info - Part 2 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> TI_CA_TMC -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
3. Real-Time Traffic Info - Part 3 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> TI_VINFO -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
4. Real-Time Traffic Info - Part 4 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> TI_TMC_REGIONAL -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
5. Real-Time Traffic Info - Part 5 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> TI_FALLBACK_DISABLED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Video In Motion & Playback Features, Owner’s Manual in Motion and Camera in Motion
steps: 1. Disable DVD/USB Video Speedlock - Part 1 (HU_CIC/NBT and HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SPEEDLOCK_X_KMH_MAX -> werte = 03 set to werte = FF
2. Disable DVD/USB Video Speedlock - Part 2 (HU_CIC/NBT and HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SPEEDLOCK_X_KMH_MIN -> werte = 03 set to werte = FF
3. Removes ‘Park’ and handbrake requirement to watch Videos - Part 3 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> VIDEO_NUR_MIT_HANDBREMSE -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
4. Removes Front Lock (Needed with VIDEO_HANDBRAKE) - Part 4 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> VIDEO_FRONT_LOCKED -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
5. Removes requirement for handbrake to watch videos - Part 5 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> VIDEO_HANDBRAKE -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
6. Removes speed requirement to watch videos - Part 6 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> VIDEO_SPEEDLOCK_CONDITION -> - set to none
7. Removes speed requirement to read service messages - Part 7 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SERVICES_MESSAGES_SPEEDLOCK_CONDITION -> - set to none
8. Removes speed requirement to read office messages - Part 8 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> OFFICE_MESSAGES_SPEEDLOCK_CONDITION -> - set to none
9. Enable Video Playback via USB (.avi, .mp4, .mkv, .m4v, etc.) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> API_USB_VIDEO -> none set to both
10. Enable MC Video playback (Saving videos to internal HD does not work) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENT_MC_VIDEO_SUPPORT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
11. Enable XVID codec for USB videos - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENT_CODEC_XVID -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
12. Enable XVCD codec for USB videos - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENT_CODEC_XVCD -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
13. Enable OGG codec during video playback - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENT_CODEC_OGG -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
14. Enables the ‘DVD Menu’ button when watching a DVD - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENT_VIDEO_HMI -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
15. Owner’s Manual in Motion - Part 1 (Only tested with HU_CIC/NBT, not sure about HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SL06_IBA_1 -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
16. Owner’s Manual in Motion - Part 2 (Only tested with HU_CIC/NBT, not sure about HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SL07_IBA_2 -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
17. Owner’s Manual in Motion - Part 3 (Only tested with HU_CIC/NBT, not sure about HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> SL21_IBA_3 -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
18. The speed when it auto disables top camera view (FF = 255 km/h) - REM/PMA -> ????? -> V_SCHWELLE_1 -> werte = 24 set to werte = FF
19. The speed when it auto disables rear camera view (FF = 255 km/h) - REM/PMA -> ????? -> V_SCHWELLE_2 -> werte = 0F set to werte = FF
20. The distance when it auto disables top camera view (FF = 255 meters) - ASCM -> ????? -> D_SCHWELLE_1 -> werte = 32 set to werte = FF
21. The distance when it auto disables rear camera view (FF = 255 meters) - REM/PMA -> ????? -> D_SCHWELLE_2 -> werte = 0A set to werte = FF
22. Activate Side View Camera at any speed - Part 1 - TRSVC -> 3000 -> SV_Activate_Speed_Limit -> werte = 0F set to werte = FF
23. Activate Side View Camera at any speed - Part 2 - TRSVC -> 3000 -> SV_Deactivate_Speed_Limit -> werte = 0F set to werte = FF

description: F30/F32 – iDrive Features
steps: 1. Plays ringtone streamed from cell phone (Works on iPhone, not Android) - CMB_MEDIA -> 3001 -> INBAND_RINGING (in HU_CIC/NBT) -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. Max amount of messages/addresses stored in vehicle, max 50 (HU_CIC/NBT only) - CMB_MEDIA -> 3008 -> MY_INFO_SUPPORTED_POIS -> wert_25 set to User Value
3. Enables Basic Voice Recognition - CMB_MEDIA -> 3000 -> SYS_EIN_AUS -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
4. Set the Ring Tone (if no Inband Ringing is set) - CMB_MEDIA -> 3001 -> RINGTONE -> ring_tone2 set to User Choice
5. Adds iDrive setting to turn on/off the audible confirmation when Alarm is armed - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ACOUSTICAL_LOCK_CONFIRM -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
6. Removes L7 Logo from Tone (Sound) Menu - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> LOGIC7_SYMBOL -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
7. Add Tire Pressure and Individual Tire Temperature to the TPMS display - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3001 -> RDC_SAFETY -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
8. Adds Weatherband radio (NOAA in the US) to the Radio Sources - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> RADIO_WEATHERBAND -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
9. Adds Developer Menu to Settings. (Shows Build/Date/Versions/etc) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ENTWICKLER_MENUE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
10. Changes DVD Region Code (WARNING: This will lock in after approx. 7 changes.) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3001 -> AREA_CODE_DVD -> Country Value set to User Choice
11. Proposes a suggested Fuel Stop in a Route when it believe it will run out of gas - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> NAVI_FUELSTOP_PROPOSAL -> nicht_activ set to activ
12. Alternative to getting Office to show up (Unknown on HU_CIC/NBT) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> PIM_Macro -> nicht_activ set to activ
13. Allows volume level to be retained up to 100% rather than startup on 25% - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> VOL_MAX_ON -> 19 set to 32
14. Displays an entire text (SMS) message on iDrive rather than three lines - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> PIM_Driving_Text -> up_to_three_lines set to Whole_text
15. iDrive Contacts separated from Phone contacts (Office only shows iDrive ones) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> CONTACTS_NAVI_SEPARATED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
16. Show volume level on screen when adjusting - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> VOLUME_POPUP_DISPLAY -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
17. Changes notification chime (gong) from BMW to BMW i, Mini, and Rolls Royce - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3002 -> SOUND_SIGNAL_SET -> 00_BMW set to 03_BMW_i
18. Changes HU_CIC/NBT Startup Screen between Animation, Splash Screen, or blank - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3001 -> STARTUP_TYPE -> animation set to black/splash
19. Change iDrive Startup Animation. (Selections below table) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3001 -> STARTUP_EMBLEM -> variant_0 set to variant_01
20. Changes the Gauges in Sports Display from BMW Amber to Red & Silver - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> M_VEHICLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
21. Makes the route simulator available under new menu "Route preview” - Part 1 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> ROUTE_FLIGHT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
22. Makes the route simulator available under new menu "Route preview” - Part 2 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> NAVI_SCROLLING_ALONG_ROUTE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
23. Enables ‘Route Info’ (Turn-by-Turn list of route) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> NAVI_ROAD_PREVIEW -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
24. Enables importing a trip into Navigation via USB Drive - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3001 -> NAVI_TRIP_IMPORT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
25. Activates Siri Eyes-Free Button (Hold down voice recognition button) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3003 -> CE_DEVICE_SPEECH_RECONGNITION -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
26. Option to allow watch next track on Basic Kombi with a retrofitted HU_CIC/NBT - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> BASIS_KOMBI_MMI_LIST -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
27. Changes Navigation Voice from English to British English - Part 1 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> LANGUAGE_ENGLISH_UK -> nicht_aktiv set to master
28. Changes Navigation Voice from English to British English - Part 2 - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> LANGUAGE_ENGLISH_US -> master set to nicht_aktiv

description: F30/F32 – General Locking/Window Features & Convenience Features
steps: 1. If Auto-Lock is enabled, then all doors will unlock at ignition shutoff - FEM_BODY -> 3040 -> CLM_UNLOCK_KL15OFF_AFTER_PIA_AUTO_LOCK -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. Allows the front windows to be rolled up while the door is opened - FEM_BODY -> 3050 -> FH_TUERAUF_STOP_MAUT -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
3. Allows the rear windows to be rolled up while the door is opened - REM -> 3050 -> FH_TUERAUF_STOP_MAUT -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
4. Delay time to activate Comfort Opening via Key Fob or CA. (HEX) - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_OEFFNEN -> werte = 0F set to werte = 0A
5. Comfort Opening: Delay between Front and Rear windows - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_OEFF_HINTEN -> werte = 05 set to User Value
6. Comfort Opening: Delay between the Rear windows and Moon Roof - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_OEFF_SHD -> werte = 23 set to User Value
7. Delay time to activate Convenience Closing via Key Fob or CA. (HEX) - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_SCHLIESSEN -> werte = 0F set to werte = 0A
8. Convenience Closing: Delay between Front and Rear windows - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_SCHL_VORNE -> werte = 05 set to User Value
9. Convenience Closing: Delay between the Front windows and Moon Roof - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORT_SCHL_SHD -> werte = 23 set to User Value
10. Open Windows/Fold Mirrors when holding Unlock on Key Fob - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORTOEFFNUNG_FB -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
11. Close Windows/Fold Mirrors when holding lock on Key Fob - FEM_BODY -> 3053 -> KOMFORTSCHLIESSUNG_FB -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
12. Unfold Mirrors on vehicle unlock via Key Fob or Comfort Access - FEM_BODY -> 3110 -> ASP_AUSKLAPPEN_NACH_KOMFORTSCHLIESSEN -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
13. Fold Mirrors when holding lock on Key Fob or Comfort Access - FEM_BODY -> 3110 -> ASP_BEIKLAPPEN_BEI_KOMFORTSCHLIESSEN -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
14. Changes the speed at which the side mirrors will auto-unfold. (Value in HEX) - FEM_BODY -> 3110 -> ASP_GESCHWINDIGKEIT_AUTO_AUSKLAPPEN -> 28 (40km/h) set to 14 (20km/h)
15. Max speed the mirrors will fold. (Value in HEX) - FEM_BODY -> 3110 -> ASP_MAX_GESCHWINDIGKEIT_BEIKLAPPEN -> 14 (20km/h) set to FF (255km/h)
16. Time before it auto-locks the car when no doors have been opened. (10s units) - FEM_BODY -> 3040 -> CLM_TIME_PIA_LOCK_AT_TIMEOUT -> User Value set to 0C (120 s)
17. Number of turn signal flashes when unlocking - FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> QUITTBLK_ENTSCHAERFEN_ANZAHL -> werte=02 set to werte=X-1 (Value is Number of flashes - 1)
18. Number of turn signal flashes when locking - FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> QUITTBLK_SICHERN_ANZAHL -> werte=01 set to werte=X-1 (Value is Number of flashes - 1)
19. Turns off radio and navigation when the driver door is opened - FEM_BODY -> 3020 -> TCM_LOGIC_R_OFF_DOOR -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
20. Change the Comfort Access trunk opening delay - FEM_BODY -> 3040 -> CLM_TIMEOUT_HK_SMO -> wert_04 set to wert_01 (HEX value by 0.1 secs)
21. Turn off taillight flashing when opening trunk via Comfort Access - FEM_BODY -> 3040 -> CLM_SMO_INDICATOR -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
22. Button on key fob will be enabled to CLOSE the trunk - HKFM -> 3010 -> SCH_FBD -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
23. Button on driver-side will be enabled to CLOSE the trunk - HKFM -> 3010 -> SCH_FBD -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
24. Required for SCH_FBD and SCH_TOEHKI to work - HKFM -> 3010 -> TASTER_FBD -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
25. Air Conditioning will remember if ‘Off’ or ‘On’ from previous shutdown - IHKA -> 3002 -> MEMORY_OFF -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
26. Remember Air Re-Circulation Setting from previous shutdown - IHKA -> 3003 -> MEMORY_UMLUFT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Vehicle Drivetrain Features, Sport Features & Active Sound Design
steps: 1. Change Active Sound Design (Part 1) **See notes.** - ASD -> 3000 -> Model Range -> F030 set to See Notes
2. Change Active Sound Design (Part 2) **See notes.** - ASD -> 3000 -> Engine -> N26B20 set to See Notes
3. Enable Launch Control (Sport Auto Tranny Required [In VO Coding]) - EGS -> 3000 -> Applikation_LC / LC -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
4. Auto-Start-Stop set to ‘Off’ at every startup - FEM_BODY -> 3023 -> TCM_MSA_DEFAULT_OFF -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
5. Auto-Start-Stop remembers if set to ‘On’ or ‘Off’ from previous shutdown - FEM_BODY -> 3023 -> TCM_MSA_MEMORY -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
6. Enables Sports Displays on non-Navi iDrive. (Doesn't work for diesel) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> EFF_DYN_SPORT_CID -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
7. Adds Sports Display units in the Language/Units settings menu - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> EFF_DYN_SPORT_UNIT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
8. Configure sport mode in iDrive (Part 1) - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> Macro_fds -> popup_only set to popup_and_config
9. Configure sport mode in iDrive (Part 2) (Optional for HU_CIC/NBT) - ICM -> 3000 -> ICMKOD_B_SPORTINDIVIDUALISIERBAR -> aus (00) set to ein (01)
10. The initial following distance for Active Cruise Control is the closest distance - ICM -> 3000 -> C_Abstandsstufe_init -> Stufe_4 set to Stufe_1
11. The vehicle will start in drive mode Eco Pro every startup - ICM -> 3000 -> ICMKOD_B_InitEco -> nicht_verbaut set to verbaut
12. Enables Sport+ mode (Not Necessary with Sport Auto Tranny) - ICM -> 3000 -> ICMKOD_B_SPORTLENKUNG -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
13. Enables the Reverse Gear Gong (Chime) Noise for Japan. (Very Annoying) - KOMBI -> 3000 -> R_GANG_AKUSTIK_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Safety Features & Precautions
steps: 1. Duration of the Seatbelt Reminder warnings (typically 90s) - ASCM -> 3001 -> GWF_SBR_WARNDAUER -> Werte=5A set to Werte = 01 (for 1 second)
2. Disable seat belt status display - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> Gurtzustandsanzeige_Beifahrer_GWF_GZA_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
3. Disable seat belt status display - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> Gurtzustandsanzeige_Fahrer_GWF_GZA_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
4. Disable seat belt reminder - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_BF_GWF_SBR_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
5. Disable seat belt reminder - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_FA_GWF_SBR_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
6. Disable seat belt reminder - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> SeatBeltReminder_SBR_Beifahrer -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
7. Disable seat belt reminder - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> SeatBeltReminder_SBR_Fahrer -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
8. Disable sound on disconnect SB - passenger - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_PreWarning_Beifahrer / SPW_BF -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
9. Disable sound on disconnect SB - driver - ASCM -> 3000 -> SBR_PreWarning_Fahrer / SPW_FA -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00
10. Disable initial 3 chime seatbelt warning - ASCM -> 3000 -> Initialwarnung_GWF_IW -> aktiv / Werte=01 set to nicht_aktiv / Werte=00

description: F30/F32 – Change Active Blind Spot Activation Speed
steps: 1. ICM -> 3000 -> C_ZSW_Aktivierunggeschwindigkeit_Funktion_low -> 50_kmh set to 20_kmh

description: F30/F32 – Enable Curb and Grass Detection for Lane Departure Warning System
steps: 1. KAFAS -> 3000 -> ROAD_EDGE_WARNING_ENABLED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Disable Legal Disclaimers
steps: 1. Removes iDrive Initial Disclaimer - HU_CIC/NBT/NBT -> 3001 -> LEGAL_DISCLAIMER_TIME -> ld_mit_timeout set to kein_ld
2. Removes disclaimer for all cameras and PDC - HU_CIC/NBT/NBT -> 3001 -> MACRO_CAM_LEGALDISCLAIMER -> ld_mit_timeout set to kein_ld

description: F30/F32 – Trip Computer auto-reset time
steps: 1. KOMBI -> BC_AUTORESET_ZEIT -> 3000 -> 4h (werte = 04) set to User Choice (Value in HEX for hours (00 = 0 hours, FF = Never))

description: F30/F32 – Adds the vehicle’s current speed to the BC cycle list (Displays on KOMBI screen)
steps: 1. KOMBI -> BC_DIGITAL_V -> 3000 -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Turns off speed correction and displays actual speed
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3000 -> BC_V_KORREKTUR -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Changes KOMBI/HUD startup to M/// Performance (Shows M550d on updated cars)
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3000 -> BMW_LOGO -> ag set to mpm

description: F30/F32 – Sets the clock via GPS signal (Needs the clock to be within 2 min. of the GPS time)
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3000 -> GPS_UHR (Intended for HU_CIC/NBT cars) -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Enables/Disables the “Auto Start-Stop Off” notification in KOMBI
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3000 -> MSA_VERFUEGBARANZEIGE_ENABLE -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Changes orange night colors of KOMBI to be white at night (No Navi Night Switch too)
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3007 -> DIM_NACHT_EIN -> werte = 32 set to werte = FF

description: F30/F32 – Enables Image of Sport+ on KOMBI
steps: 1. KOMBI -> 3000 -> FDS_MENUE_TEXT_1/2/3/4 -> menue_4 set to menue_3
2. KOMBI -> 3000 -> FDS_MENUE_SIGNAL_1/2/3/4 -> menue_4 set to menue_3

description: F30/F32 – Enables LIM Function (Cruise Control ‘Set’ button acts as ‘LIM’ button)
steps: 1. [1/4] - KOMBI -> 3003 -> SLD_ENABLE -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
2. [2/4] - ICM -> 3000 -> SLD_Funktion -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
3. [3/4] - ICM -> 3000 -> C_Umschaltung_ACC_DCC -> unterdruecken set to zugelassen
4. [4/4] - ICM -> 3000 -> LDM_SET_Taste -> SET_und_aktivieren__IO set to nur_SET__O

description: F30/F32 – LED Replacement Turn Signal Bulbs Activation
steps: 1. Turns off Front-Left Turn Signal Bulb Cold Monitoring - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_L_KALTUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
2. Turns off Front-Left Turn Signal Bulb Warm Monitoring - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_L_WARMUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
3. Enables Front-Left LED bulb - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_L_IS_LED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
4. Turns off Front-Right Turn Signal Bulb Cold Monitoring - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_R_KALTUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
5. Turns off Front-Right Turn Signal Bulb Warm Monitoring - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_R_WARMUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
6. Enables Front-Right LED bulb - FEM_BODY -> 3061 -> FRA_V_R_IS_LED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
7. Turns off Rear-Left Turn Signal Bulb Cold Monitoring - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_L_KALTUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
8. Turns off Rear-Left Turn Signal Bulb Warm Monitoring - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_L_WARMUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
9. Enables Rear-Left LED bulb **May cause Check Engine Light** - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_L_IS_LED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
10. Turns off Rear-Right Turn Signal Bulb Cold Monitoring - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_R_KALTUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
11. Turns off Rear-Right Turn Signal Bulb Warm Monitoring - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_R_WARMUEBERWACHUNG -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv
12. Enables Rear-Right LED bulb **May cause Check Engine Light** - FEM_BODY/REM -> 3061 -> FRA_H_R_IS_LED -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv

description: F30/F32 – Assorted Lighting Features
steps: 1. FEM_BODY -> 3130 -> RLS_DEF_FLC_SCHWELLWERT_SATZ -> “Normal” set to See notes (Reduce the Automatic headlamp sensitivity. (see notes))
2. FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> BLINKZYKLEN_ANZAHL_TIPP -> werte = 02 set to werte = X-1 (Change the triple blinker blinks to any amount. (Value is XX + 1))
3. FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> ESS_AKTIVIERBARER_AUSGANG -> flachenvergroesserun set to bremslicht_blinkend (Change Emergency brake light from Inner Brake Lights to Flashing Lights)
4. FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> ESS_AKTIVIERUNG_GESCHW -> werte=02 (5 km/h) set to User Value (Threshold Speed for Activating Emergency brake light)
5. FEM_BODY -> 3063 -> MAPPING_SIDEMARKER_L_OUTPUT -> fra_v_l set to off (Turns off the left front side-marker. (The blinker is still active))
6. FEM_BODY -> 3063 -> MAPPING_SIDEMARKER_R_OUTPUT -> fra_v_r set to off (Turns off the right front side-marker. (The blinker is still active))
7. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> OVT_BEI_RUECKFAHRLICHT -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv (Door handle LEDs light up when engaged in Reverse)
8. FEM_BODY -> 3050 -> NSW_AUS_BEI_FL -> aktiv set to nicht_aktiv (Allows Fog Lights to remain on when high beams are active.)
9. FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> NSW_EIN_AUF_LDS_STL -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv (Allows Fog Lights to turn on while only parking lights are on.)
10. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> Ambiente_Helligkeit -> 64 set to User Value (Brightness of Interior Ambient Lighting (Value is in HEX))
11. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> Ambiente_Nachfuehrung -> aktiv set to nicht aktiv (Separates Ambient Light Level and Instrument Cluster Light Level)
12. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> IB_Einschalt_begr_lok -> 8 set to User Value (The time the interior lights stay illuminated while locking (Value in HEX))
13. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> IB_Einschalt_begr_ulok -> 8 set to User Value (The time the interior lights stay illuminated while unlocking (Value in HEX))
14. FEM_BODY -> 3070 -> WL_HELLIGKEIT -> 64 set to User Value (Brightness of Welcome Lights)

description: F30/F32 – Fog lights illuminate in the steered direction
steps: 1. Shows Day-Running Lights option in iDrive Settings, in Lighting - HU_CIC/NBT -> 3000 -> Daydriving_light -> standard set to aktiv
2. Enables Day-Running Lights - FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> TFL_MODUS -> Off set to Tfl_s (0, A) or Drl_s (0, A, P) (Letters: 0: Off, A: Auto, P: Parking)
3. Turns On Left Tail-light (Inner Part) on with DRL - REM -> 3062 -> MAPPING_TAGFAHRL_H2_L_OUTPUT -> off set to sl_2_l
4. Turns On Right Tail-light (Inner Part) on with DRL - REM -> 3062 -> MAPPING_TAGFAHRL_H2_R_OUTPUT -> off set to sl_2_r
5. Turns On Left Tail-light (Outer Part) on with DRL - REM -> 3062 -> MAPPING_TAGFAHRL_H_L_OUTPUT -> off set to sl_l
6. Turns On Right Tail-light (Outer Part) on with DRL - REM -> 3062 -> MAPPING_TAGFAHRL_H_R_OUTPUT -> off set to sl_r
7. Activate Rear Fog Lamp Switch - Part 1/5 - FEM_BODY -> 3060 -> NSL_Verbaut -> Nicht Verbaut set to Verbaut
8. Activate Rear-Left Fog Lamp - Part 2/5 - REM -> 3063 -> Mapping_Nebelschlussl_L_output -> off set to nsl_l
9. Activate Rear-Left Fog Lamp - Part 3/5 - REM -> 3063 -> Mapping_Nebelschlussl_L_Function -> nebelschlusslicht set to nebelschlusslicht
10. Activate Rear-Right Fog Lamp - Part 4/5 - REM -> 3063 -> Mapping_Nebelschlussl_R_output -> off set to nsl_r
11. Activate Rear-Right Fog Lamp - Part 5/5 - REM -> 3063 -> Mapping_Nebelschlussl_R_Function -> nebelschlusslicht set to nebelschlusslicht

description: F30/F32 – Cornering Lights (Fog Lamps) & Fog Lamp Welcome Lights
steps: 1. Enables cornering lights - Part 1 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> C_CLC_ENA -> F030disable set to F030enable
2. Enables cornering lights - Part 2 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> C_BLC_ENA -> nicht_aktiv set to aktiv
3. Enables cornering lights - Part 3 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> KL_ENABLE_LI -> KL_Aus set to KL_Ein
4. Enables cornering lights - Part 4 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> KL_ENABLE_RE -> KL_Aus set to KL_Ein
5. Enables cornering lights - Part 5 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> MAPPING_abbiegel_L_output -> Off set to nsw_l
6. Enables cornering lights - Part 6 - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> MAPPING_abbiegel_R_output -> Off set to nsw_r
7. Turns on Left Fog Lamp with Welcome Lights - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> MAPPING_NEBELSCHW_L_PART_OF_WL -> nicht_aktiv set to Soft_On
8. Turns on Right Fog Lamp with Welcome Lights - FEM_BODY -> 3073 -> MAPPING_NEBELSCHW_R_PART_OF_WL -> nicht_aktiv set to Soft_On

description: F30/F32 – Angel LED Brightness (Xenon Headlamps or LED Headlamps required)

description: F15 – Enable TJA (ACC-STOP and GO requried). In addition you need to purchase the Steering wheel with touch sensor, sensor module and the wiring harness. (Part numbers in thread below)
steps: 1. NEEDED - ICM -> 3000 -> C-Stauassistant Vorhanden -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
2. NEEDED - BDC_BODY ->  -> ComAdapterPdu_31_Anzeige_Fahrerassistentsystem -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
3. NEEDED - BDC_BODY ->  -> HOD_Verbaut -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
4. NEEDED - BDC_BODY ->  -> LIN_VARIANTE_MFL -> ACC_Sport_SLD (21) set to ACC_Sport_STA_SDL (25)
5. NEEDED - BDC_BODY ->  -> PERSONEN_WARNUNG_STA -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
6. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_CC_DRASY_ALIVE -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
7. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_CC_DRASY_CRC -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
8. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_CC_DRASY_TIMEOUT -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
9. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_DRASY_ALIVE -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
10. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_DRASY_APPL -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
11. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_DRASY_CRC -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
12. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> DISP_DRASY_TIMEOUT -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
13. NEEDED - KOMBI ->  -> STA_ENABLE -> nicht aktiv set to aktiv
14. OPTIONAL This will let you increase the speed limit for TJA (MPH) - ICM -> 3000 -> C_QalcRel_v_Tacho_aktiv_mph -> Werte= 20 set to Werte= 3F
15. OPTIONAL This will let you increase the speed limit for TJA (KMH) - ICM -> 3000 -> C_QalcRel_v_Tacho_aktiv_kmh -> Werte= 32 set to Werte= 63
16. OPTIONAL This will let you enable the function on all roads - ICM -> 3000 -> C_STA_Einschraenkung -> Autobahn set to keine Einschreankung
